event.name: Join Boston Civic Media's Climate Change Across the City 6/13
event.shortDescription: Join Boston Civic Media to envision the future of collaboration around climate change in Boston.

description.html: We'll gather for the afternoon to build community across sectors and plot a shared agenda for taking climate action in the city. The event will feature a keynote presentation, an interactive workshop and a session of lightning talks for participants to present their completed or ongoing projects, or seek out collaborations and partnerships.

next.name: Themes for an Ethics of Play
